title: Starry Night
fact: Painted in 1889, it depicts Van Gogh’s view from the asylum.

title: The Persistence of Memory
fact: Famous for its melting clocks and surreal landscape.

title: Mona Lisa
fact: Known for her enigmatic smile, painted in the early 1500s.

title: The Kiss
fact: A masterpiece of the Art Nouveau movement, painted in 1907-1908.
